info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

get.description: Fetches call campaign data, including status, agent details, calling numbers, and campaign performance metrics.

parameters.name: Company-Name
parameters.description: The name of the schema to be used for the request

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search term used to filter results

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the campaign (e.g., running, paused, completed)

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction of the call (e.g., Outbound or Inbound)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The field by which the results should be sorted (e.g., name, date)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve results from (for pagination)

post.description: Creates a new call campaign, including key campaign details such as Campaign Name, Selected AI Agent, Call Direction, Selected Phone Number, Number Rotation settings, Campaign Budget (in minutes), and Scheduling options.

parameters.name: Company-Name
parameters.description: The name of the schema to be used for the request

parameters.description: The name of the schema to be used for the request

parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to be updated

parameters.description: The name of the schema to be used for the request

agent_crm_type.description: Type of CRM integration for the agent

type.description: Type of voicemail action (e.g., hangup)

pk.description: Primary key for the language model

general_tools.description: List of tools available to the model

ghl_book_meeting.description: Indicates if meeting booking is enabled

model.description: Select the underlying text LLM. If not set, defaults to gpt-4o.

s2s_model.description: Select the underlying speech-to-speech model. Can only set this or model, not both.

model_temperature.description: Controls randomness of the response. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more random. Defaults to 0 if unset.

model_high_priority.description: Enables fast tier with high priority pool for lower latency. Defaults to false.

general_prompt.description: General prompt appended to system prompt regardless of agent state.

type.description: The tool type to end the call.

description.description: A description of what the tool does.

type.description: The tool type to transfer the call.

name.description: The name of the tool, must not contain spaces.

description.description: A description of what the tool does.
description.example: Transfers the call to another agent or number.

type.description: Indicates a predefined phone number for transfer.

number.description: The phone number to transfer the call to in E.164 format.

oneOf.description: Details for transferring to a predefined number.

type.description: Indicates dynamic routing for call transfer.

prompt.description: The prompt to determine the transfer destination.
prompt.example: If the user wants to reach support, transfer to +1 (925) 222-4452; if the user wants to reach sales, transfer to +1 (925) 1111-3444

oneOf.description: Details for dynamically determining the transfer destination.

transfer_destination.description: The destination details for the call transfer.

type.description: Indicates a cold transfer.

show_transferee_as_caller.description: Whether to display the transferee's number as the caller ID.

agent_detection_timeout_ms.description: Time in milliseconds to wait before considering the transfer failed.

on_hold_music.description: Music to play while the caller is being transferred.

opt_out_human_detection.description: Whether to skip human detection for the transfer.

opt_out_initial_message.description: Whether to skip the AI saying 'Hello' after connecting the call.

type.description: Indicates a warm transfer.
Indicates a prompt-based handoff.

prompt.description: The prompt for the warm transfer public handoff.
prompt.example: Please hold while I connect you to the support team.

oneOf.description: Prompt-based public handoff for warm transfer.

type.description: Indicates a static message handoff.

message.description: The static message for the warm transfer public handoff.

oneOf.description: Static message public handoff for warm transfer.

public_handoff_option.description: Public handoff options for warm transfer.

type.description: Indicates a prompt-based private handoff.

prompt.description: The prompt for the warm transfer private handoff.
prompt.example: This is a call regarding a support issue.

oneOf.description: Prompt-based private handoff for warm transfer.

type.description: Indicates a static message private handoff.

message.description: The static message for the warm transfer private handoff.

oneOf.description: Static message private handoff for warm transfer.

private_handoff_option.description: Private handoff options for warm transfer.

agent_detection_timeout_ms.description: Time in milliseconds to wait before considering the transfer failed.

on_hold_music.description: Music to play while the caller is being transferred.

opt_out_human_detection.description: Whether to skip human detection for the transfer.

opt_out_initial_message.description: Whether to skip the AI saying 'Hello' after connecting the call.

transfer_option.description: Options for the call transfer type.

type.description: The tool type to book an appointment in the calendar.

description.description: A description of what the tool does.

cal_api_key.description: The Cal.com API key for accessing the calendar.

event_type_id.description: The ID of the event type to book in the calendar.

oneOf.description: Configuration for booking an appointment in the calendar.

type.description: The tool type to check calendar availability.

description.description: A description of what the tool does.
description.example: Checks available time slots in the calendar.

cal_api_key.description: The Cal.com API key for accessing the calendar.

event_type_id.description: The ID of the event type to check for availability.

date.description: The date to check for availability.

timezone.description: The timezone for the availability check.

parameters.description: Parameters required for checking calendar availability.

type.description: The tool type to press a digit during a call.

description.description: A description of what the tool does.
description.example: Simulates pressing a digit on the phone keypad.

parameters.description: Parameters required for pressing a digit.

type.description: The tool type to swap to another agent.

description.description: A description of what the tool does.
description.example: Swaps the current agent with another agent.

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent to swap to.

execution_message_description.description: The message to be spoken during the agent swap execution, if enabled.
execution_message_description.example: Please hold while I transfer you to another agent.

post_call_analysis_setting.description: Determines which agents are included in post-call analysis.

speak_during_execution.description: Whether to speak the execution message during the agent swap.

oneOf.description: Configuration for swapping to another agent.

type.description: The tool type to swap to another agent.

name.description: Name of the tool. Must be unique within all tools available to LLM at any given time. Must be consisted of a-z, A-Z, 0-9, or contain underscores and dashes, with a maximum length of 64 (no space allowed).

description.description: Describes what the tool does, sometimes can also include information about when to call the tool.

type.description: The data type of the analysis field, set to string.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.

examples.description: Example values for the analysis field.

type.description: The data type of the analysis field, set to enum.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.

choices.description: Possible values for the analysis field.

type.description: The data type of the analysis field, set to boolean.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.

type.description: The data type of the analysis field, set to number.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.
examples: Duration of the call in minutes

items.description: Configuration for a single post-call analysis field.

oneOf.description: Configuration for swapping to another agent.

description.description: Description of the MCP tool.

input_schema.description: The input schema of the MCP tool.

{key}.description: Any property key under input_schema, represented as a string.

oneOf.description: Configuration for swapping to another agent.

items.description: Configuration for a single tool available to the model.

general_tools.description: List of tools the model may call (e.g., end call, transfer call, or custom tools).

begin_message.description: First utterance said by the agent. If empty, agent waits for user to speak. If not set, LLM generates dynamically.

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

message.description: Message describing the result of the request

default_dynamic_variables.description: A dictionary of default dynamic variables used in the model
A dictionary of default dynamic variables used in the model

agent_name.description: The name of the agent, used for reference.

voice_id.description: Unique voice ID used for the agent.

voice_temperature.description: Controls voice stability for ElevenLabs voices. Lower is more stable, higher is more variant. Defaults to 1.

voice_speed.description: Controls voice speed. Lower is slower, higher is faster. Defaults to 1.

volume.description: Controls agent volume. Lower is quieter, higher is louder. Defaults to 1.

responsiveness.description: Controls agent responsiveness. Lower is slower, higher is faster. Defaults to 1.

interruption_sensitivity.description: Controls sensitivity to user interruptions. Lower is harder to interrupt, higher is easier. Defaults to 1.

pronunciation_dictionary.description: A list of words / phrases and their pronunciation to be used to guide the audio synthesize for consistent pronunciation. Currently only supported for English & 11labs voices. Set to null to remove pronunciation dictionary from this agent.

word.description: The string of word / phrase to be annotated with pronunciation.

alphabet.description: The phonetic alphabet to be used for pronunciation.

phoneme.description: Pronunciation of the word in the format of a IPA / CMU pronunciation.

enable_backchannel.description: Enables backchannel responses (e.g., 'yeah', 'uh-huh'). Defaults to false.

backchannel_frequency.description: Controls backchannel frequency when enabled. Lower is less frequent, higher is more frequent. Defaults to 0.8.

backchannel_words.description: List of backchannel words. Defaults apply if not set.

vocab_specialization.description: Vocabulary set for transcription (English only). Defaults to general.

allow_user_dtmf.description: If set to true, DTMF input will be accepted and processed. If false, any DTMF input will be ignored. Default to true.

digit_limit.description: The maximum number of digits allowed in the user's DTMF (Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency) input per turn. Once this limit is reached, the input is considered complete and a response will be generated immediately.

timeout_ms.description: The time (in milliseconds) to wait for user DTMF input before timing out. The timer resets with each digit received.

termination_key.description: A single key that signals the end of DTMF input. Acceptable values include any digit (09), the pound/hash symbol (#), or the asterisk (*).

denoising_mode.description: Denoising mode for audio. Defaults to noise-cancellation.

reminder_trigger_ms.description: Triggers reminder after user silence duration (ms). Defaults to 10000.

reminder_max_count.description: Maximum number of reminders for unresponsive user. Defaults to 1.

ambient_sound.description: Ambient sound for realistic call experience. Set to null to remove.

ambient_sound_volume.description: Controls ambient sound volume. Lower is quieter, higher is louder. Defaults to 1.

language.description: Language and dialect for speech recognition. Defaults to en-US.

boosted_keywords.description: Keywords to bias transcriber model. Set to null to remove.

normalize_for_speech.description: Normalizes text to spoken form for consistent synthesis.

end_call_after_silence_ms.description: Ends call after user silence duration (ms). Defaults to 600000.

voicemail_option.description: Voicemail detection settings. Set to null to disable.

type.description: Type of voicemail action (e.g., static_text, hangup)

text.description: Text for voicemail prompt, if applicable
text.example: Please give us a callback tomorrow at 10am.

type.description: The data type of the analysis field, set to string.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.

examples.description: Example values for the analysis field.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.

choices.description: Possible values for the analysis field.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.

name.description: The name of the analysis field.

description.description: A description of what the analysis field represents.
examples: Duration of the call in minutes

items.description: Configuration for a single post-call analysis field.

analysis_data.description: Additional data to extract post-call. Available after call ends.

ring_duration_ms.description: Ring duration for calls (ms). Defaults to 30000.

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

message.description: Message describing the result of the request

pk.description: Primary key for the AI call agent

agent_name.description: Name of the AI call agent

agent_id.description: Unique identifier for the AI call agent

voice_id.description: Identifier for the voice used by the agent

language.description: Language code or type (e.g., en-US, multi)

pronunciation_dictionary.description: List of words/phrases with pronunciations for consistent synthesis. Set to null to remove.

vocab_specialization.description: Vocabulary set for transcription (English only). Defaults to general.

allow_user_dtmf.description: If set to true, DTMF input will be accepted and processed. If false, any DTMF input will be ignored. Default to true.

digit_limit.description: The maximum number of digits allowed in the user's DTMF (Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency) input per turn. Once this limit is reached, the input is considered complete and a response will be generated immediately.

timeout_ms.description: The time (in milliseconds) to wait for user DTMF input before timing out. The timer resets with each digit received.

termination_key.description: A single key that signals the end of DTMF input. Acceptable values include any digit (09), the pound/hash symbol (#), or the asterisk (*).

denoising_mode.description: Denoising mode for audio. Defaults to noise-cancellation.

end_call_after_silence.description: Duration of silence before ending the call (in seconds)

reminder_trigger.description: Time before triggering a reminder (in seconds)

llm.description: Identifier for the language model used

enable_backchannel.description: Indicates if backchannel responses are enabled

normalize_for_speech.description: Indicates if speech normalization is enabled

enable_transcription_formatting.description: Indicates if transcription formatting is enabled

boosted_keywords.description: List of keywords to boost in processing

voicemail_detection_timeout_ms.description: Timeout for voicemail detection in milliseconds

begin_message_delay_ms.description: Delay before starting message in milliseconds

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the agent was last updated

is_locked.description: Indicates if the agent is locked

call_scheduling.description: Indicates if call scheduling is enabled

voice_list.description: List of available voices for the agent

preview_audio_url.description: URL to the voice's preview audio

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the voice was last updated

knowledge_base.description: Knowledge base linked to the campaign

calling_number.description: Primary phone number used for the campaign

bugget_left.description: Remaining budget as a string value

tags.description: List of tag IDs to associate with the campaign

total_bugget.description: Total budget (in minutes) allocated for the campaign

status.description: The current status of the campaign (e.g., 'running', 'paused')

is_rescheduled.description: Indicates whether the campaign is rescheduled

number_rotation.description: Indicates whether number rotation is enabled for the quick campaign

sunday.description: Whether the campaign runs on Sundays

message.description: Descriptive message about the result

credit_deductions_change.description: Change in credit usage compared to the previous period

campaign_results_change.description: Change in campaign results compared to the previous period

status_counts.description: Counts of each call status in the campaign (e.g., AGENT_HANGUP, DIAL_NO_ANSWER)

outcome_counts.description: Counts of each outcome classification (e.g., POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, UNKNOWN)

number_of_callbacks.description: Details or count of scheduled callbacks if any (can be empty)

cumulative_user_hangups.description: List of user IDs or identifiers who hung up the call (can be empty)

response_sentiment_counts.description: Count of response sentiments detected during the campaign

improvement_tag_counts.description: Counts of improvement tags used in the campaign

analysis_dict.description: Final summary and aggregated metrics of the campaign

total_appointment_booked.description: Total number of appointments booked in the campaign

booking_rate.description: Percentage of booked appointments from connected calls
